page.title: 10General Accomodation.
page.content: Apart from farm accommodation previously discussed there are several other types of housing, though none of it "Council".{Much of Eglingham {Village still belongs to the estate although some houses have now been {sold to private individuals,}as have plots of land on which new houses have been errected, strictly conforming to {conservation regulations}(eg. stone structures, small window panes etc.) Three vicarages have been built in over a century. The second, a large Victorian building, has been sold and is now a private home whilst a new, small convenient one has recently been built.Indeed it is one of only four houses built in several years, two of which were pre-fabricated stone-faced houses. One more house is currently under construction.Planning permission for several others is being sought.
